skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: blockchain radio
des: Listen to the latest 24/7 Blockchain, Crypto, & Fintech News, Talk, & Analysis on CyberFM. No Music, All Talk. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
